text: Carlos Acevedo López (born 19 April 1996) is a Mexican professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Liga MX club Santos Laguna. ==Club career== Acevedo made his Liga MX debut with Santos Laguna on 20 August 2016 in a match against Cruz Azul which resulted in a 3–1 loss. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Santos Laguna *Liga MX: Clausura 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Mexican footballers Category:Santos Laguna footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:People from Torreón Category:Footballers from Coahuila
title: Carlos Acevedo
